snippet: The Islamic State has focused on prophetic texts stating that Islam will be victorious after an apocalyptic battle to be set off once Western armies come to the region.
abstract: News Analysis; United States, in its efforts to battle Islamic State, is seeking to avoid ground war, which would fulfill ISIS's prophecy and spark new recruiting drive; ISIS bases its ideology on prophetic text saying Islam will be victor after apocalyptic battle set off by invasion from Western armies.
